content.query:
DECLARE @Print BIT = 1
DECLARE @Execute BIT = 
DECLARE @SQL VARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT @SQL = STRING_AGG('DROP TABLE ' + CONCAT_WS('.',T.TABLE_SCHEMA, T.TABLE_NAME) + '; ', ' ')
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES T
WHERE T.TABLE_SCHEMA = 'vault'

IF @Print = 1 BEGIN PRINT @SQL END
IF @Execute = 1 BEGIN EXECUTE (@SQL) END
